mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_user WHERE username = #{username} and password=#{password}
SELECT * FROM chat_user ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_user ( id, username, nickname, password, avatar_url, email, phone, status, last_login_ip, last_login_time, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{avatarUrl}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{lastLoginTime}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_user SET nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{password}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, status = #{status}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.* FROM chat_room_member m1 JOIN chat_room_member m2 ON m1.room_id = m2.room_id JOIN chat_user u ON m2.user_id = u.id WHERE m1.user_id = #{id};
